docs.lead_paragraph: GOD'S sunlight has had credit for more false merits than any other of the many superstitions to which men have fallen victim. We recognize the fact that it kills bacteria, but we ignorantly fail to reflect that it has just as fatal an affect on the protoplasm which composes the human system.

headline.main: SUNLIGHT DECLARED THE ENEMY OF MAN; A New Theory of History Based on the Rivalry of the Brunette and the Blonde -- Major Woodruff Attributes American Nervousness to Excessive Light. A New Interpretation of History. Actinic Rays Destructive. Black Skin a Protection. The Brunette Zone. Origin of the Blonde Man.
